mapper.insert: insert into ordermenu (openDay, printNum, tableNum, orderTime, orderAmnt) values(#{openDay},#{printNum},#{tableNum},#{orderTime},#{orderAmnt})
mapper.select: select orderNum, openDay, printNum, tableNum, orderTime, orderAmnt from ordermenu Where orderNum=#{orderNum}
select orderNum, openDay, printNum, tableNum, orderTime, orderAmnt, orderComplete from ordermenu where orderNum > 0 order by orderNum desc
